title: 49. Jessica Dishon – The Family Matter
description:
In this episode of MWMH, Payton tells Garrett the story of Jessica Dishon and how she disappeared from her family’s driveway. 
Case Sources:
Cold Case Files S1 E8 – a family secret
https://crimehistorian.com/2014/10/08/crime-historian-jessica-dishon-part-1-of-2/
 https://www.wdrb.com/news/jessica-dishon-s-uncle-indicted-in-her-murder/article_2ecf8e7a-6756-5b88-a220-b5e977c3b92e.html
 https://www.courier-journal.com/story/news/local/bullitt/2015/03/27/jessica-dishon-family-wins-year-saga/70533396/
